<title level="1" right="Rules">[Defense Potency](/Rules.aspx?ID=1362)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 196</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 5th level, you gain a +1 potency bonus to AC. At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2, and at 18th level, to +3.
</column>
